data.title: Nyerere’s Postcolonial Approach to Education
data.meta_description: Julius Nyerere has had many detractors. He is, however, one of Africa’s best known and most revered post-colonial figures. A devout Catholic, son of a village chief in Butiama (Northern Tanzania) and a former school teacher in a Catholic school, Julius...
